title: How to stop reminder notification after the first time
content:
Hey! Can anyoneor got any advice?

I like that my phone vibrates the first time I get a notification but if I don't clear the notification, the phone vibrates again a few hours later! Is there a way to have the phone buzz only when I get new notifications and not just reminding me of my old ones without clearing them?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
